title: Bloomberg Markets: Wal-Mart's Online Sales Soar
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Wal-Mart's Online Sales Soar
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Matthew Boyle U.S. Retail Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Wal-Mart's gaining momentum in its fight against Amazon.com Inc., with its online sales growing at their fastest clip in at least five years.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
